constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 34 (Tuesday, February 22, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SAN NICOLAS:
H.R. 6819.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, clause 3 provides Congress with the
power to ``regulate commerce with foreign nations, and among
the several states, and with the Indian tribes.''
[Page H1141]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

sponsors.fullName: Del. San Nicolas, Michael F. Q. [D-GU-At Large]

title: Compact of Free Association Host Communities Support Act
